```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(kableExtra)
library(gt)
library(xaringanExtra)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE,
	fig.width = 7.252,
	fig.height = 4,
	dpi = 300
)
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
```

```{r xaringan-themer, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(xaringanthemer)
style_duo(primary_color = "#1F4257",
          secondary_color = "#F97B64",
          base_font_size = "24px",
          text_font_size = "28px",
          table_row_border_color = "FFFFFF",
          table_row_even_background_color = "FFFFFF",
          colors = c(red = "#f34213",
                     purple = "#3e2f5b",
                     orange = "#F97B64",
                     green = "#136f63",
                     white = "#FFFFFF")
)
```

```{r xaringan-extra, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
xaringanExtra::use_tile_view() # press "O" button
xaringanExtra::use_panelset()
xaringanExtra::use_scribble()
xaringanExtra::use_animate_css() #animate all silides: use_animate_all("slide_left")
xaringanExtra::use_editable()
xaringanExtra::use_webcam()
xaringanExtra::use_clipboard()
xaringanExtra::use_search(show_icon = TRUE)
xaringanExtra::use_extra_styles(
  hover_code_line = TRUE,         #<<
  mute_unhighlighted_code = TRUE  #<<
)
xaringanExtra::use_tachyons()
```
